statements: SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, roi FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, roi FROM campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY roi DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, roi FROM campaigns WHERE budget >= 5000 ORDER BY roi DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01' AND roi > 3.5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_campaigns, AVG(budget) AS avg_budget FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM campaign_budget_allocation;
SELECT campaign_id, budget_amount FROM campaign_budget_allocation WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT allocated_date, budget_amount FROM campaign_budget_allocation ORDER BY allocated_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, total_sales, ad_impressions FROM campaign_roi_tracking WHERE total_sales > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, total_sales, ad_impressions FROM campaign_roi_tracking ORDER BY total_sales ASC, ad_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_budget_allocation WHERE budget_amount > 1000 ORDER BY allocated_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, total_sales, ad_impressions FROM campaign_roi_tracking WHERE total_sales > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, budget_amount, allocated_date FROM campaign_budget_allocation JOIN campaign_roi_tracking ON campaign_budget_allocation.campaign_id = campaign_roi_tracking.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales_sum FROM campaign_roi_tracking GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_sales_sum > 10000 ORDER BY total_sales_sum DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, budget_amount, allocated_date FROM campaign_budget_allocation WHERE campaign_id LIKE 'CAMPAIGN%' ORDER BY budget_amount DESC, allocated_date ASC;
SELECT id, campaign_name, budget_amount FROM campaign_budgets;
SELECT campaign_name, budget_amount, id FROM campaign_budgets;
SELECT id, campaign_name, spent_amount, revenue_generated FROM campaign_roi;
SELECT campaign_name, revenue_generated, id, spent_amount FROM campaign_roi;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT campaign_name, budget_amount FROM campaign_budgets WHERE budget_amount > 5000
SELECT campaign_name, spent_amount, revenue_generated FROM campaign_roi WHERE revenue_generated > spent_amount
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY conversions DESC
SELECT campaign_name, budget_amount, spent_amount, revenue_generated FROM campaign_budgets INNER JOIN campaign_roi ON campaign_budgets.campaign_name = campaign_roi.campaign_name
SELECT * FROM campaign;
SELECT name, budget FROM campaign WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, budget FROM campaign WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT name, end_date FROM campaign ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT c.name as CampaignName, mc.name as MarketingChannel FROM campaign c JOIN campaign_channel cc ON c.id = cc.campaign_id JOIN marketing_channel mc ON cc.channel_id = mc.id;
SELECT name, budget FROM campaign WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT c.name, cc.name AS channel_name FROM campaign c JOIN campaign_channel cc ON c.id = cc.campaign_id
SELECT c.name AS campaign_name, cr.roi AS campaign_roi FROM campaign c JOIN campaign_roi cr ON c.id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.roi > 1.5
SELECT c.name AS campaign_name, mc.name AS channel_name, mc.type AS channel_type FROM campaign c JOIN campaign_channel cc ON c.id = cc.campaign_id JOIN marketing_channel mc ON cc.channel_id = mc.id
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, amount_spent, expense_date FROM campaigns c INNER JOIN expenses e ON c.campaign_id = e.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, channel_name, clicks, impressions FROM campaign_performance JOIN channels ON campaign_performance.channel_id = channels.channel_id WHERE clicks > 1000 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, channel_name, allocation FROM allocations JOIN channels ON allocations.channel_id = channels.channel_id WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY allocation DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, amount_spent, expense_date FROM expenses JOIN campaigns ON expenses.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%' ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
